:"GPL-3.0-or-later","urls":["bzz-raw://c6b87d383df9fab91a62629107ebd44122d16de55a01c3996cbb155a1373bde7","dweb:/ipfs/QmTLfmcHJh8ZYbLai1oAkjBak9fpMnv3HDaGoMQd3wFcNF"]}},"version":1}

flashFee().details: Notes: - This fee represents a percentage, not an amount. Do not confuse it with {IERC3156FlashLender.flashFee}, which calculates the fee amount for a specified flash loan amount. - Unlike the protocol fee, this is a global fee applied to all flash loans, not a per-asset fee.

params.token: The contract address of the ERC-20 asset to check.

params.asset: The contract address of the ERC-20 asset to query.

returns.fee: The protocol fee denoted as a fixed-point number where 1e18 is 100%.

setFlashFee(uint256).details: Emits a {SetFlashFee} event. Notes: - Does not revert if the fee is the same. Requirements: - `msg.sender` must be the contract admin.

params.newFlashFee: The new flash fee to set, denoted as a fixed-point number where 1e18 is 100%.

setProtocolFee(address,uint256).details: Emits a {SetProtocolFee} event. Notes: - The fee is not denoted in units of the asset's decimals; it is a fixed-point number. Refer to the PRBMath documentation for more detail on the logic of UD60x18. - Does not revert if the fee is the same. Requirements: - `msg.sender` must be the contract admin.

params.asset: The contract address of the ERC-20 asset to update the fee for.
params.newProtocolFee: The new protocol fee, denoted as a fixed-point number where 1e18 is 100%.

toggleFlashAsset(address).details: Emits a {ToggleFlashAsset} event. Requirements: - `msg.sender` must be the admin.

params.asset: The address of the ERC-20 asset to toggle.

transferAdmin(address).details: Notes: - Does not revert if the admin is the same. - This function can potentially leave the contract without an admin, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the admin. Requirements: - `msg.sender` must be the contract admin.

params.newAdmin: The address of the new admin.

admin().notice: The address of the admin account or contract.

flashFee().notice: Retrieves the global flash fee, denoted as a fixed-point number where 1e18 is 100%.

isFlashAsset(address).notice: Retrieves a flag indicating whether the provided ERC-20 asset can be flash loaned.

protocolFees(address).notice: Retrieves the protocol fee for all streams created with the provided ERC-20 asset.

setFlashFee(uint256).notice: Updates the flash fee charged on all flash loans made with any ERC-20 asset.

setProtocolFee(address,uint256).notice: Sets a new protocol fee that will be charged on all streams created with the provided ERC-20 asset.

toggleFlashAsset(address).notice: Toggles the flash loanability of an ERC-20 asset.

transferAdmin(address).notice: Transfers the contract admin to a new address.

documentation.text:
@notice Retrieves a flag indicating whether the provided ERC-20 asset can be flash loaned.
 @param token The contract address of the ERC-20 asset to check.
